jump_scares.spoiler: The title screen suddenly appears accompanied by a scream
An ornament shatters
The walkie talkie makes a screeching noise
After Tony shines the torch around and says “hello”, several birds suddenly fly away
Accompanied by a sound effect, Tony shines the torch down a hallway and sees a girl in the distance
There is a loud bang on the door
A hand appears in the bottom right corner of the screen
As Tony approaches the door there is a loud bang
The door slams shut behind Tony
As Tony struggles with his torch, a ghoulish girl who is missing an eye appears in front of him
Professor Goodman sees movement from the upstairs room and as he pulls back Simon is standing right behind him
Simon hits a figure with his car as he talks on the phone
There is a loud bang on Simon’s car
Simon leans back to reveal a figure at the driver’s side window
Accompanied by a sound effect, Goodman sees a ghostly image of himself inside the car
As Priddle approaches the baby crib, the towels behind him are suddenly flung into the air
The hooded figure in the distance suddenly appears directly in front of Goodman
There is the sound of glass breaking somewhere in the house
The ghoulish Maria suddenly races towards Priddle
The hooded figure suddenly jumps out of the crib behind Goodman
A bird flies into the window
Sheets blow upwards at a lady setting up Halloween decorations
Mr Wilkins is startled by noise and movement coming from a body bag
Billy jumps up from behind the table
A monster jumps from the swamp
Laurie spins around and comes face to face with a man dressed in a black costume
An egg is thrown at the old man’s window from outside
After pouring a drink, Herman heads back to his game and hears a loud bang from another room
Herman pulls away the sheets on his bed revealing no one is there. He then spins around and a man is standing behind him
Lights flicker down the hallway revealing a girl standing at the end of it
Herman spins his head back to the hallway but the girl is standing right in front of him
Herman spins around to face Clarissa and sees a man in underwear standing outside
The man in underwear is suddenly standing inside the house
Herman pulls away the sheets to reveal a screaming little girl underneath
Something splashes in the pool
The body lying on the table suddenly jolts upwards after the cameraman begins to cover her face with a sheet
Aliens burst into the room
After the police disappear, aliens suddenly appear in the field
Aliens appear in the field in front of the camera
Ayesha suddenly attacks Larry
Ayesha suddenly appears in front of the partially open closet and is shot by Larry
One of the men opens a door and becomes startled by something they see while entering
One of the men bursts through the door behind the lead character in the bathroom
The cameraman spots a figure in the basement
A small child runs through the doorway behind Emily
Emily uses the camera’s flash and spots the small child in a room
Emily spins the camera and stops it, revealing a kid’s face
The camera moves from a severed head and reveals a figure in the doorway
